game_description: You can exercise and enjoy professional workouts on your own, with a real trainer, or with your friends. Have fun and get challenged in the arcade mode, choose your daily session from several predefined workouts and exercises designed by qualified professionals. Improve your technique and health. Get exercises and feedback from sports and fitness professionals. Don't forget to choose the best environment, it can be a beach, the top of the city or even the moon. We are with you throughout your eXRcise experience, have fun!
Languages: English, Spanish (Argentina), Spanish (Chile), Spanish (Colombia), Spanish (Mexico), Spanish (Peru), Spanish (Puerto Rico), Spanish (Spain), Spanish (Venezuela)
review_1: The Idea is good, there are still some part which has to be enhanced, but the development is on going and proceed fast. Good potential. Waiting for the final release.
review_2: It's an amazing app to do your workout routine, it's completely different to other fitness apps that normally offer you like a videogame, in this case it's focus on real training at the same time yo have fun.
review_3: A view bugs but like the app
